description:
Updated to be easier to use and grippier than ever. With a refined harness that uses low profile rivets, there are no hangups when it comes to donning your Nanospikes. New sole ridges and lug design help with traction to give you more confidence on the slippy stuff.

  • 10 tungsten carbide spikes per foot bite into ice and hard packed snow
  • Low-profile, lightweight design results in a natural stride
  • Flexible design adapts to terrain with molded lug design to increase traction
  • Rubber straps with low profile rivets fit easily on a wide range of shoe type with reduced pressure points
  • Rubber remains flexible down to -35°C
  • Improved heel tab makes taking them on and off a breeze
  • Includes tote sack
name: Kahtoola NANOspikes v2 Footwear Traction - Unisex
